name: 2014 Cinelli Mash Histogram Frameset
description: Those who think it’s just a new colorway don’t know what’s under the hood. This new geometry plays to the preferences of particular riders. The ride is suited to high cornering loads, fast switchbacks and scissors like movements dancing in the streets. This new frame is a black, grey and blue stealth-mode version of the ‘histogram’ graphic designed by MASH SF rider Garrett Chow. Definitely fast-twitch and hair-trigger. Built with the same high-end Columbus tube set as the original MASH ‘Bolt’ frame, but with even steeper head and seat tube angles plus a raised bottom bracket with the geo stamped under the shell.

name: 2013 Cinelli Vigorelli Frameset
description:
Cinelli’s iconic all-purpose competition track frame. Vigorelli undergoes subtle facelift with goal of further improving the competitive efficiency of the frame. Small modifications the benefit of which the athlete will note immediately in competitive situations.

Named for the famed Milano velodrome where the reputations of great cyclists such as Archambaud, Coppi, Anquetil, Baldini and Moser were built. The Vigorelli velodrome is no longer used, but the legend lives on in this track-specific racing machine

    Columbus Airplane (Supersection oversized shape) 7005-T6 aluminum frame construction with rear-facing, steel insert horizontal track dropouts @ 120mm spacing (no brake mount on frame)
    1-1/8" Columbus Straight Carbon color matched, carbon/aluminum (blades/steerer) fork with a 35mm rake and an integrated headset (42.0mm Campy Hiddenset standard): drilled for a brake, but plugged and painted for cleaner aesthetics
    Includes headset, seat clamp and replaceable stainless steel dropout inserts
    Weight frame/fork: 1500g/560g (54cm)

name: 2013 Corima 4 Spoke Front Wheel
description:
New DESIGN ! The 4 Spoke 2D carbon wheel is the worldwide reference of monocoque carbon wheels. New profile (47 mm). The profile of the rim with the 2D concept and the shape of the spokes like a drop of water (leading edge and trailing edge) make it very aerodynamic.

The front wheel is very light, only 720g, it has an integrated magnet for use with a bike computer and its front "Chrono" hub is built with ceramic bearings.

Created from the beginning to be a versatile wheel, it is perfect for road use (time-trial and triathlon) and for track use thanks to its excellent lateral stiffness.

The 4 Spoke 2D wheel is produced in HM version (High Modulus carbon fibres):

The 4 Spoke 2D carbon wheelset does not require any particular maintenance thanks to its monocoque structure.

name: 2013 Dolan Zeta frameset
description:
Seta, Italian for silk and the word that perfectly describes the smoothness of the ride and the elegance and simplicity of design of this newest frame by designer and builder Terry Dolan. The Seta brings you Dolan legacy in a full carbon frame design of incredibly light weight at a very sweet price.
Already tried and tested in pro events over the last few years courtesy of members of the British Cycling Endurance Track squad, the Dolan Seta is expected to take the world by storm over the coming year.
Noticing a gap in the market between high end alloy frames and the top end carbon frames such as the Dolan DF3, Dolan set about developing the original Seta two years ago. There was in-depth work in state of the art wind tunnels, then field testing the results and direct performance gains with some of British cycling’s top riders racing the prototype frames in various events around the world.
The conclusion of the development process is the new incredibly light Seta frame, constructed from Ultra hi-modulus UDP Carbon Fibre.
Unlike the vast majority of endurance track frames currently available, it has a high strength factor and stiffness that maximizes the rider’s transmission of power through the drive train. This is essential in order to cope with the stresses and strains of fixed gear riding, points which the Seta addresses by surrounding the bottom bracket with an increased amount of carbon fibre. The result: All the power you put into the bike to move it forward is not lost in any flexing of the frame.
As events get faster and faster it’s important that the frame presents no compromise in performance and is effortless to ride. The Dolan Seta hits the mark, combining the snap and light weight desired for the sprint feel with the essential comfort and smoothness of an endurance bike.
Ultra hi-modulus UDP (unidirectional carbon) carbon fiber frame with traditional design. One-piece front end construction, wishbone seat stays, and shortened flattened chainstays.
 
 Includes:

Alpina Carbon/Alloy Integrated Track Fork - 30mm
Alpina Integrated Head Set

Spec:

English Thread Bottom Bracket
31.6mm Seat Post Diameter
1 1/8th Integra Head Tube

name: 2013 Leader 725 Frame Corsa Red
description:

New For 2013 ! 

Now available in a lighter weight, with hydroformed headbadge and machined dropouts. 
 
From the street to the track, the 725 is easily the most famous Leader Bike on the market to date. Made of 6061 heat treated ultralight butted aluminum, light weight and compact. Featuring Leaders one of a kind and world famous geometry.  Backed by a limited lifetime warranty, you cant go wrong!

- 1-1/8" with oversized crown
- Smooth & Strong Welds

- Headset: Zero Stack 

- Seat tube: 27.2mm

name: 2013 Leader 722 Heritage Edition Frame White
description:
*Forks are not included*

The newest addition to the Leader Bike line up is a twist on a classic frame. The 722 Heritage edition has a lot of the same classic features as the original but a few modern upgrades as well. The classic logos really stand out on the frame along with the Hydroformed seat tube cut out that you won't find on a lot of cut outs! The geometry got a slight change to make it a little tighter and more responsive.

The Leader 722 Steel Pista Frame is made of Eco Founderland 4130 Cro-moly steel. Beautiful smooth welds, hydroformed tubesets and color selection give this a frame a unique and amazing feel.

Excellent for urban and track riding. The rear bridge is drilled for a brake. Dropouts feature a built in chain tensioner to ensure a great ride.

Features:
- Includes Seatpost Clamp
- 1 1/8'' Standard Head tube
- 27.2mm Seat Post 
- 68mm English Bottom Bracket
- Hand Tig Welded

name: 2012 Corima Aero Track Wheelset
description:
2012 Corima Aero Track Tubular Wheelset

Since 1992, the AERO carbon wheel is world renown. This wheel allows you to benefit from all the Corima recent innovations on the rims, it offers the best value for money in its class.

It’s a versatile wheel that can be used for either flat or hilly roads.

The front AERO carbon wheel is built with 24 CX-Ray spokes and the rear AERO carbon wheel is built with 24 CX spokes. This reliable setting has been proven over the years. It’s the perfect wheel to start getting along with the performance of the Corima carbon wheels.

The rear AERO tubular wheel is also available for track (rear 24 spokes). The front axle is threaded and allows the setting of 2 track bolts + screws (ref: 400161) for a track use.

name: 2012 Corima CN Disc Track Wheel
description:
2012 Corima CN Disc Track Tubular Wheel

The Corima original DISC wheel is the worldwide reference among carbon Disc wheels. It can be used for road racing, time trial or track. The monocoque carbon wheel is not only light but also stiff enough to give fast acceleration on the track with ultimate speed for time trials.

The 2D concept adapted to the carbon Disc wheel improves its aerodynamics and performance.

A practical and aesthetic removable carbon cover (ref: 270095) protects the flexible valve extender.

The rear road cassette DISC wheel can also be used for track (for cyclists who sometimes ride on track), thanks to the specific preparation of the wheel in the Corima workshops and the purchase of the rear "Road to Track" converter kit (ref: 400115).

name: 2012 Sram Omnium Crankset
description:
Truvativ track crankset with BB

The purists’ choice for street and track performance. The new Omnium track crankset is the first external bearing track crank in the world. Designed for world-class track racing, but also at home as the ultimate “fixie” crankset, the Omnium features our strongest and stiffest alloy, 7050-T6. The full 5mm thick 7075-T6 chainwheel was developed for use only with 1/2 x 1/8 chains. Reports from our test riders suggest that this is the stiffest crank they’ve ever ridden.

Hard anodized 1/8" x 48t chainring.
Spindle Interface Type: TruVativ GXP
Chainring BCD: 144 mm / 5-bolt
Chain Compatibility: 1/2" x 1/8"
Pedal Spindle: 9/16"
Advertised Weight: 825.0 g.
Sram GXP English threaded BB included

name: 2012 Paul Components 100% Pure Crankset
description:
100% Pure Crank from Paul Component Engineering.

Our Road Cranks take advantage of the narrower chainstays found on road frames, and the narrow chain-line of our High Flange hubs.

These cranks use a specially designed interlocking chain ring/crank interface. Four 7075 Aluminum chain ring bolts with T25 Torx heads bolt through the chain ring and into the reinforced spider on the crank arm. We've made the threads even deeper and reinforced the spider making the assembly impossible to strip.

We machine the crank arms from 2024 aluminum, a very strong and stiff material. They are given a high polish finish and optional black anodization. We currently make the Road Crank in two lengths: 165mm and 170mm.

The chain rings are machined out of 6.3mm thick aluminum plate; very sturdy. They're currently designed only to work with ⅛" chains (track and bmx), and are unpolished. Replacement chain rings are available.

Chain rings are available in two different patterns and six different sizes. 32, 34, 36, 39, 46 and 48 tooth rings are available in our Circles pattern. Additionally, 46 and 48 tooth rings are available in our "Royal Flush" suit of cards pattern.

Now for the important part. There are two square taper designs in use today, JIS (Shimano, and pretty much everyone else except Campagnolo), and ISO which is used by Campagnolo. We designed our cranks around Campagnolo 111mm width spindles, so that's what you should use. They make a really affordable one called the ACH, and they make some really nice expensive ones too. We also strongly recommend the Phil Wood 110.5 Campy taper bottom bracket which lets you fine tune the chain-line.

More info:
http://www.paulcomp.com/rdcrank

name: 2012 ENVE 45 Clincher Rim
description:
Best described as a jack of all trades this “Magic Bullet” is known as the ENVE 45! When we are asked which wheel set does it all, the natural response steers toward the 45. It is one of the most versatile carbon rims available, ideal for everyday training as well as uncompromised race day performance. Implementing our proprietary features and manufacturing process, our 45 is available in three models: 45 Clincher, 1.45 Tubular (Ultralite), and 2.45 Tubular (Standard). Load the combination that works best for you then . . . pull the trigger!


Weight: 440g
Depth: 45mm
Width: 22mm
Hole Count: 20

name: 2012 Knog Blinder 4v USB Rechargeable Rear Light
description:
Specifications:

•26 x 76 x 62mm 
•39g
•Industrial grade UV-resistant silicone rubber, polycarbonate housing, anodised aluminium, solid stainless steel.
•Rechargeable Lithium Polymer
•REAR: 44 lumens (LED Rating)


Features

•LEDs: Efficient LEDs designed to provide maximum brightness level for up to 90% of the battery burn time for each mode. Rather than LED brightness deteriorating during your ride.
•Lens:  Use of an optic design to provide a balanced ratio of beam width and distance to safely illuminate you and the path ahead.
•Visibility:  Light is visible at over 800 metres
•Light Modes:  5 light modes: 1.Steady, 2.Fast Flash, 3.Organic Flash Slow, 4.Organic Flash Fast, 5. Eco-flash.
•Burn Time:  Blinder 4V lasts upto 3 hours in steady mode, 4 - 5 hours  in modes 2 and 3, 15 hours in mode 4 and up to 50 hours in mode 5
•Battery:  Rechargeable Lithium polymer battery via integrated USB plug.
•Integrated USB Plug:  Designed to be exposed to the elements, the plug is also waterproof and will not be damaged by exposure.
•Button:  New longer button push on (0.75sec) prevents accidental activation of your light. Short presses switch modes continuously. Similarly, the light is switched off with a long button push off (0.5sec). 
•Storage Mode:  Storage mode provides the best longevity for your Blinder light. Repeat this procedure every 3 months thereafter if the light isn't being used.1. Charge the light for a full charge cycle. (indicator glows green when charged).2. Remove light from USB charging device / port.3. Turn light on in any mode.4. Hold button down for more than 5 seconds, at which point the indicator LED will turn red.5. The light itself will remain on until the Blinder switches itself off and into storage mode.
•Bike Attachment:  Tool-less attachment for handlebars/rear-posts and frames of 22-32mm ø
•100% Waterproof:  The Blinder 4V is IP66 Tested and 100%waterproof against all elements
•Testing:  The Blinder 4V has been tested against the following; Drop tests, corrosion tests, UV tests, Electrical shock and static, vibration and impact, temperature and humidity, cycle testing and CE certification.

name: 2012 Knog Milkman Lock
description:
Specifications:

•75 x 75 x 20mm
•90cm cable
•110g
•Braided steel cable. Zinc die-cast latch with polycarbonate casing

Features:

• Security Rating:  20/100
• Body:  Injection Moulded Polycarbonate
• Lock Housing:  Assembled using permanent mechanical fasteners to ensure high strength, robust joint that makes it difficult to lever open the product. 
• Materials: injection moulding engineering plastic, durable painted outer with matte finish.
• Lock Barrel:  Blade style lock barrel, with 1600 unique combinations. Materials: Die Cast Zinc Alloy, nickel plated
• Locking Mechanism: Spring loaded, rotating latch mechanism. 
• Materials: Machined stainless steel, with silicone outer.
• Retractable Cable:  90cm braided steel cable with translucent PVC outer. Crimped to 6.5mm stainless steel locking pin retractable cable.
• 3 Overmoulded Keys: 3 colour-coded overmoulded keys with wrist coil. 
• Convenient Size: Fits into back pocket
• Finish: Colourful, hardwearing painted finish with 4 unique colour options that protects your bike from any unwanted damage
• Testing: We subject our locks range to a vast array of environmental tests to ensure they are fit for purpose for everyday use. These procedures are undertaken during research and development through to prototype and manufacture. These include: Drop Tests, Impact Tests, Corrosion Testing, Vibration Testing, Extreme Temperature Testing, Cycle Testing.

name: 2011 Lightweight Rundkurs Track Wheelset
description:
The track circuit is a very unforgiving place. It doesn’t give the cyclist – or us – any quarter. There is no other environment that poses such a stern test of a wheel’s quality and so mercilessly exposes its weaknesses. You won't find any weaknesses with RUNDKURS though. We’ve arranged the spoke design and weight distribution in a way that ensures optimum cornering precision. No matter whether you go for the spoked version (130 mm) or the disc version (100 mm front, 120 mm rear), you’ll never find another wheel that is as tough and as agile for ultra-precise handling. The race circuit may still push you to your limits, but the performance limits of RUNDKURS are nowhere to be seen. 


Weight FW: 555 gr
Weight BW: 620 gr
Rim depth: 53 mm
Rim width: 19.5 mm
No. of spokes (FW/BW): 20/20
Tyre width: 19-27 mm
Max. system weight: 120 kg

Track use specific

Spoking pattern designed to handle track-specific forces during cornering

name: Ass Savers Fender
description:
SmartAss, an emergency fender that’s there when you need it, gone when you don’t. 

New & Improved!

Tired of sitting at the office with a wet ass all day just because it rained this morning? Do you live in a climate where a shower can come out of nowhere even though the sun was shining just a minute ago? Not ready to bike in a wet suit or burden your bike with fenders? Relax. Its finally here.

More info:
http://ass-savers.com

name: 2011 Look AL 464 P Track Frameset
description:
• ALUMINIUM FRAME 6061 AND GEOMETRY

The use of upper range aluminium allows making a “track school” frame the geometry of which is very close to carbon frames such as the 496 and 596 that have skimmed the podiums for years now tout while respecting a much lower budget. Thus beginner track cyclists can benefit of all the know-how of LOOK as far as the geometry of its products is concerned to carry out their activity under the best conditions. It is as if the whole experience of LOOK for track sponsoring with the best athletes in the world was resumed in this frame.
• MEGA TUBE DIAGONAL

The diagonal tube is oversized to increase the frame’s rigidity. Its drop of water shape ensures for its part good aerodynamic performances.
• CARBON TRACK FORK

The fork of the AL 464 P is a 100% carbon fork (pivot included). It is both lightweight and ultra-resistant. Its carbon composition benefits of special reinforcements for its use on the track. Its lateral rigidity has been notably increased. It also approaches an aerodynamic profile with branch sections creating minimum turbulences.
This fork meets the European standard EN 14781 (frontal shock of 144 joules).

More info:
http://www.lookcycle.com/en/us/piste/cadres/al-464-p-frame.html

name: 2012 Affinity Kissena Frameset

The Affinity Kissena aero track frame set is constructed of 7005 aircraft grade aluminum tubing with a 1 1/8th integrated track specific fork with alloy steerer (no hole for brake). The Kissena is Affinity’s premier track specific frame set with proprietary geometry, and a unique fully integrated seat mast.
Affinity is proud to have the 2010 Kissena in full production.

name: 2011 HED H3D Tubular Front Wheel
description:
700c
Track axle

How do you improve on the best? You build the H3D that's what you do.

What is the H3D? The H3D is built by applying our Jet 9 aero rim section to the standard H3.

When was the H3D first developed? The H3D has been in production since 2007 but those of you with sharp eyes might recall the memorable moment in the 2005 Tour de France when Lance Armstrong passed Jan Ullrich in the opening prologue while astride a front H3D. Steve Hed actually flew it With an approving nod from Big Tex we began work on a production model.

Why ride the H3D vs. the standard H3? There are two particular scenarios where the H3D has an advantage over the H3.

1. Used as a front wheel the H3D is faster than the H3 out to 10 degrees of wind yaw angle. Generally this means that 25mph and faster riders will get a benefit from the H3D because at these speeds yaw angles are generally low. At higher yaw angles the H3 is a faster wheel which is why for the majority of triathletes where speeds are 25mph and less the H3 still tends to have an advantage.

2. When used as a rear wheel the H3D has been proven to faster than any other rear wheel besides a disc. This has been proven over the course of many full bike and rider tests. This makes the rear H3D the ideal choice for events where disc wheels are not allowed or if you that prefer the ride and lighter feel of non disc wheels. It is believed that the blades of the H3 actually help to correct yaw angle winds in the rear of the bike and thus show results that are better than their wheel alone data.

Having only been in formal production for 1 year the H3D has been ridden to countless victories including the 2008 Beijing Olympics, Tour de France, Giro d'Italia, World Championships, numerous national TT championships, multiple Ironman races, multiple half Ironman races, and a complete domination on the track at the Six Day races.

What more is there to say besides where shall we ship your pair?

name: 2010 Zipp 1080 Clincher Front Wheel
description:
The 1080 is the fastest non-disc in the world, yet it handles crosswinds with ease. Unleashed in a race against the clock, the 1080 knows no limits.

The sight of a lone rider hunched over the aero bars may lack the spectacle of a field sprint or the epic scenery of a mountain stage. But if you’ve ever poured yourself into a time trial or a bike leg, then you’ve shared an experience with rising triathlon star Linsey Corbin and Olympic time trial champion Fabian Cancellara.

On their bikes, you’ll find the 108mm-deep Zipp 1080, the world’s fastest non-disc wheel. To improve upon the previous holder of that title, our 81mm-deep 808, we tested and retested a range of prototypes for the 1080 before settling on fully toroidal shape that blends 5 distinct curves to smooth airflow.

This new profile, which we’ve since applied to the 808 and other wheels in our line, makes the 1080 nearly 30 seconds faster over 40km than a three-spoke wheel but generates no additional side force in a crosswind. Plus, with our Carbon Bridge technology for impact resistance and external spoke nipples for serviceability, the 1080 Tubular gives you pure speed without a hint of delicacy.

Despite its depth, the 1080 was light enough for Fabian to dominate Beijing’s hilly time trial course and so stable that a smaller rider like Linsey could use it in Kona. When seconds count –which they always do – the 1080 is perhaps the ultimate piece of speed weaponry.

The S-42 stem is Victoire's first product dedicated to the art of Bike Polo. Machined into a solid block of 7075-T6 alloy, this stem use an innovative clamping system. You just have to tighten the bolts on the front of the stem to lock the bars and the fork together. This system provides a much safer area on the back of the stem with no bolts to protect knees. The short lenght allow good maniability and control of the bike. At only 4,8oz, this stem is half the weight of a classic bmx stem.

- CNC machined in a solid block of aero-grade 7075-T6 alloy-Work with threadless forks
- 42mm lenght
- 12,5mm rise

name: 2011 Victoire Large Flange Track Hub
description:
The hubset is our very first product at Victoire Cycles. We wanted to create the lightest and strongest high flanges hubset in the market, with the best materials and optimal design. After many prototypes and lot of testing, our hubs are now ready to hit the roads.

We use aero grade 7075-T6 alloy for every parts of the hubs. This material is 300% stronger than the common alloy used in the cycle industry. All the parts are CNC machined with the highest tolerances.

The spokes holes are chamfered so that the spoke's head perfectly fits the hub body, creating a stronger surface and increasing the wheel's strength. The titanium bolts are machined to fit road forks (9mm). If you ride with modern 10mm forks, you can replace the bolts by the same non machined, available as spare parts.

Specs:
- Body, axle and spacers CNC machined in solid rounds of aero-grade 7075-T6 alloy
- Oversized female axle
- Custom M10 titanium bolts, machined to fit road forks (9mm slot)
- 100mm spacing
- 6902 2RS bearings
- Angled flanges for optimal spoke alignment
- Available in 32 and 36 spoke holes (custom drilling available on request)
- Black and silver finish (custom colors available on request)
- Unique splined interface for cog, choice of 17-19T
- 44mm chainline
- BSA (left 1.29*24 TPI) lockring included
- Weight: Front: 204g
                Rear: 265g complete with bolts, washers and lockring

More info:
www.victoire-cycles.com

规格：
- 鼓身，轴和垫片数控加工， 航空级7075 - T6合金鋁
- M10的钛螺栓，9MM插槽
- 一百毫米间距
- 6902 2RS 轴承
- 32和36孔（根据要求提供）
- 黑色和银色（根据要求提供自定颜色）

name: 2012 Selle San Marco Bar Tape
description:
The Ultimate handlebar tape! San Marco have pushed the envelope by using their extensive knowledge of synthetic fabrics to create a handlebar tape like no other.

Lorica is the synthetic leather material used to cover their saddles, and now San Marco have adapted it to cover your bars! Truly bomb-proof, this tape carries bevelled edges for a uniform finish and an adhesive layer to make sure it stays firmly in place. Highly tear and abrasion resistant, this tape can also be washed to keep it looking spick and span.

Once fitted, it is soft and forgiving on the hands and offers great grip, even in the wet. And if you are fortunate enough to own a San Marco saddle, you will find exactly the same colour handlebar tape to match it. Got Dura-Ace? Got Carbon? Got your perfect bike? Then give your bike an upgrade like no other with San Marco Lorica handle bar tape - the only bar tape you will ever need!

Weight: 88 grams per pack including plugs

More info:
http://www.sellesanmarco.it/en/Collezione/Accessories/7/BAR%20TAPE%20MICROFEEL.html

重量：每包88克，包括插頭

name: 2012 Continental GP Attack + Force Tire Pack
description:
Our Vectran and Black Chili technologies have been radically applied to this uncompromising race tyre set. The new GP Attack benefits from its special version of our Black Chili Compound that gives the streamlined 22 mm front tyre more grip with lower rolling resistance. The optimum front wheel tyre gets you quickly into the turns, feeling light and responsive whilst providing ample service life.

The new GP Force is a powerful rear wheel specialist and with its 24 mm section width combined with a fast Black Chili Compound, it gives excellent traction and road handling that’s second to none.  

Both tyres are made with Vectran™ puncture protection and show wear and tear levels via indicators in the tread, details that show professionals are at work.

Vectran 和 Black Chili技術已經從根本應用上使用比賽輪胎。Black Chili的22毫米前胎Attack有很強的抓地力與低阻力，讓你快速進入彎角，感覺輕，反應靈敏，同時提供充足的使用壽命。

新的GP Force是一個功能強大的後胎，​​24毫米節闊，它提供了極好的抓地力和道路處理，首屈一指。

兩個輪胎通過VECTRAN™穿刺保護和展示磨損測試，顯示專業人員在工作中的細緻。

name: 2012 Continental Grand Prix 4-Season Tire
description:
Thanks to its DuraSkin™ anti-tear fabric, the Grand Prix 4-Season holds up under extreme conditions. In the Paris –Roubaix race, the “Hell of the North”, cyclists equipped with DuraSkin™ enhanced tyres have the fewest tyre related problems during the race.

DuraSkin - Continentals patented polyamide layer that provides excellent sidewall protection.

Incorporating our special wear resistant carbon compound, the tyre is characterized by very good mileage performance as well as excellent adhesion on wet roads and at low temperatures.

THE innovation in puncture protection!

With the 23 mm, 25 mm and 28 mm versions, the Grand Prix 4-Season makes it possible to select the right tyre for various road qualities and comfort requirements. A double VectranBreaker belt under the tread raises the puncture and cut protection to the highest level.

name: 2012 Continental Grand Prix 4000 Tire
description:
For the coloured GP 4000 tyres, the activated silica compound improves the handling at stability limits and gives great rolling resistance. The anti-tear formula in the rubber compound prevents tread brittleness while increasing mileage performance. Xirallic colours give your machine a look of stylish elegance.

The extra special thing about the GP 4000 and GP 4000S is their puncture protection made from Vectran liquid crystal fibres.

THE innovation in puncture protection!

The patented Vectran Breaker reconciles the conflicting goals of low weight, low rolling resistance and top puncture and cut resistance in a fascinating manner. The Vectran fluid crystals fibres were developed for airbag systems in the automotive and aerospace industries. The material is extremly tear and cut resistant and is also flexible. It retains these properties even under constant stress - as opposed to Aramide.

name: 2012 Continental Grand Prix 4000s Tire
description:
German magazine TOUR has featured a comprehensive road tyre test, covering many aspects of tyre performance, even including 'real time' wet grip where their human tester donned motorcycle leathers and pushed his specially adapted test bicycle to the limit on each different set of tyres.

The complete test can be downloaded here. The Continental GP4000s was a clear winner by performing well in all areas. The test was won in 2007, 2008, 2009 (in 2010 the limited version GP 4000 RS was unbeatable).

Not only the German magazines are cocksure! The magazine BICYCLING from the USA announced:  

“This is not only the best Conti ever but, all things considered, one of the best tires ever made.“

Fast, smart, special

The Grand Prix 4000s boasts global appeal as the best all round race bike tyre on the market. Not only is it fast and super grippy, thanks to its state of the art Black Chili rubber compound, but it is also tough with a healthy tread layer and of course our Vectran™ anti puncture breaker layer underneath.

Black Chili Compound - it‘s all about how you mix it!
                            
THE innovation in puncture protection!

So for reliability, longevity and all out performance for your race machine, the GP 4000s is the only choice.

More info:
http://www.conti-online.com/generator/www/de/en/continental/bicycle/themes/race/racetyres/grand_prix_4000S/gp4000S_en.html

name: 2012 Continental Sprinter Tubular Tire
description:
Its function is in its name. The Sprinter is a fast tyre for the shorter road events like criteriums. With a nylon puncture protection breaker it is now even more reliable without losing its terrific rolling qualities. Its flexible casing and the extremely adhesive Black Chili Compound keeps contact with the road even in fast 90° bends.

With its low weight and good acceleration it is most definitely the fastest tyre in the last 400 metres.

More info:
http://www.conti-online.com/generator/www/de/en/continental/bicycle/themes/race/tubularroad/sprinter/sprinter_en.html

name: 2012 Continental Competition Tubular Tire
description:
It is the most reliable of all the tyres in the professional peloton and has proven itself time and time again on the world race circuit, often accompanying prominent cyclists on their way to victory. We are proud of our Competition. That’s why we always try to keep him on the road to victory.

The Competition was the first tyre to feature Black Chili Compound and the VectranBreaker.

More info:
http://www.conti-online.com/generator/www/de/en/continental/bicycle/themes/race/tubularroad/competition/competition_en.html

name: 2012 H+Son SL42 Rim
description:
The SL42 rim is the original 42mm high rim that took us over a year to develop. Like Formation Face, SL42 owes its stiffness and aerodynamics to 42mm profile height. The two models share the same lightness, reduced to around 615 grams (plus or minus 15 grams) using the G609 aluminum alloy which is also 30 percent stronger than the 6061 aluminum alloy used in standard rim manufacture. SL42 features a machined side wall for use with rim brakes.

Specifications

Weight: 615 grams
Material: G609 Alloy
Height: 42 mm
Size: 700c 650c
Drillings: 24 28 32 36
Colors: Subject to change due to mood swings or rainfall pattern.
Joint: Welded 

規格：

重量：615克
材質：G609合金
高度：42毫米
尺寸：700C 650C
線孔：24 28 32 36
顏色：黑，銀
接頭：焊接

name: 2012 H+Son Formation Face Rim
description:
Formation Face is a true "V" profile rim. Without any stress points in the sidewall, the uniform triangle shape improves the rim's lateral stiffness in comparison to SL42. The simple profile shape also saves weight by reducing the distance between the bead hook and the spoke bed. Because of the thinness of the sidewalls, technical hurdles had to be overcome in engineering a welded joint. Despite the profile height, we were able to reduce the weight to around 615 grams (plus or minus 15 grams) using the G609 aluminum alloy which is also 30 percent stronger than the 6061 aluminum alloy used in standard rim manufacture.

Specifications

Weight: 615 grams
Material: G609 Alloy
Height: 42 mm
Size: 700c 650c
Drillings: 24 28 32 36
Colors: Subject to change due to mood swings or rainfall pattern.
Joint: Welded

規格

重量：615克
材質：G609合金
高度：42毫米
尺寸：700C650C
鑽孔：2428 32 36
顏色：銀黑
接頭：焊接

name: 2012 H+Son TB14 Box Rim
description:
TB14 was inspired by the classic aesthetics of rims from the era when steel frames ruled competitive cycling and benefits from contemporary improvements in rim manufacture and profile design. We have always admired the look of the classic box section rim. From sourcing double eyelets to crafting new molds for the valve badge and its hardware, we dedicated neurotic attention and careful detail to every aspect of this rim.
The pairing of a 23mm wide profile with a 23mm tire is fast becoming the industry standard for competitive road cycling. The wider rim adds stiffness and gives a profile that resembles a tubular tire. The advantage of this rim/tire profile can be felt immediately when taking corners as the tire is no longer shaped like a light bulb, flopping over with high loads.

The TB14 is made with the stiffer and stronger G609 aluminum alloy and features our unique and invisible welded joint. Rims are anodized after machining.

Specifications

Weight: 490 grams
Material: G609 Alloy
Height: 14.1 mm
Width: 23 mm
Size: 700c
Drillings: 28 32 36
Colors: Hard Ano, High Polish, Black Ano
Joint: Welded

規格

重量：490克
材質：G609合金
厚度：14.1毫米
寬度：23毫米
尺寸：700C
鑽孔：28 32 36
顏色：銀，灰
接頭：焊接

description:
No saddle is legendary as it, the CONCOR. name: 2012 HED H3 Tubular Front Wheel
description:
700c
Track axle

The H3 has propelled more Grand Tour riders to the podium than any other wheel. Why? It is not a secret. The H3 is the ultimate in all wind conditions. Whether it is a headwind, crosswind, or tailwind, the H3 is fast. Other wheels (even our own) are certainly speedy, but all other wheels have a specific wind range where they excel. The H3 offers speed no matter where the wind is. The pros know this, and many count on the H3 as their no compromise TT wheel choice.

Our H3 wheels offer full on aero performance in any conditions. The key to the wide range of performance is the combination of a 55mm deep rim section, the airfoil section spokes and the smooth transitions between the two. The 55mm deep rim keeps drag low at shallow yaw angles. When the yaw angle goes past 15° the aero spokes work to keep the wheel from stalling, and drag stays flat. The optimum wind angle for the H3 is an amazing.

More info: http://www.hedcycling.com/h3/default.asp?content=H3_Tubular


H3是廣泛用於大型巡迴賽的車輪，無論是逆風，側風或順風，H3均有很好的表現。雖然其他車輪（甚至我們自己）也有相當的速度，但專家都知道這一點，其他車輪都有一個特定的風力範圍。而H3的破風能力無論身在何處，也是出類拔萃。很多計算上，H3的TT車輪是作為單車選手的不二之選。

*只適用於管胎

name: 2011 Leader Kagero
description:
The Kagero project is a collaboration between Leader Bike and PEDAL Consumption. In 2009, Leader bike and PC began discussions on creating a high-end collaboration frameset for production purposes. It's no secret of my love for Lo-Pro style frames, so it was quite easy when it came to deciding what type of frame style we wanted to design. After numerous revisions through prototype testing, we have achieved what we have finally sought after… a blissful Lo-Pro style aluminum frameset that is aggressive, strong, stiff, light, and above all… FAST.

Throughout the Kagero’s entire design process, we made sure every detail was not overlooked. At first glance, the Kagero is characterized by smooth welds, compact geometry, and subtle branding. Paying homage to my family crest, we enlisted the creative mind of Jeck Ebreo to design a head tube logo that truly represents this frame. The final touches consisted of using metallic gunmetal gray that displays a radiant shine throughout the frameset. Also, we included a custom laser-etched PC seat collar to finalize the process.

With its branded high-end double-butted aluminum tubing, aggressive Pista style track fork, seamless rear dropouts... we highly recommend the Kagero for the street, track, and everyday bombing. 

More info: http://thekagero.com

name: 2011 Thomson X4 Stem
description:
The design team for the new Thomson X4 had a tough goal: make a stem better than the Thomson Elite 25.4. Early tests showed us that our competitors’ 31.8 stems were heavier and weaker than our Thomson Elite 25.4. At Thomson the X4 was not done until it was stronger, lighter and longer lived than the legendary Thomson Elite. 
The Thomson X4 stem allows you to realize the benefits of stiffer forks and stiffer 31.8 bars. X4 offers precise steering, tracking, and more control while riding, all wrapped up in a beautiful design. 
The Thomson X4 is stronger and 30 grams lighter than the Thomson Elite 25.4 mountain stem. It features a traditional steerer clamp that is shaped to save weight and to be knee friendly. X4 is absolutely the best combination of strength and weight available. Thomson stems are the strongest in the industry, meaning freeride and downhill riders can run Thomson confidently. 
Solid one piece 7000 series aluminum extruded billet precision machined by Thomson in our Macon, Georgia factory. 
Built and tested to the same standards as our aerospace parts. 
The best stem for all-around Mountain Bike and Cyclocross riding. 

適合1 1/8" 前叉和31.8mm口徑的車把使用

name: 2011 Thomson X2 Stem
description:
X2 is for the rider who understands what it takes to stay up front. Energy wasted in flex is the enemy on a road bike. X2 keeps your energy moving forward. 
The Thomson X2 Road stem allows you to realize the benefits of stiffer forks and stiffer 31.8 bars. X2 offers precise steering, tracking, and more control while riding, all wrapped up in a beautiful design. 
The Thomson X2 features a lighter, 2-bolt handlebar clamp. The interlocking handlebar clamp of the X2 makes is as torsionally strong as other 4-bolt designs, while being lighter and narrower. X2 has a low 36mm stack height. X2 is available in 2 rise options; 10 and 17 degree. Both the 10 and 17 degree stem can be run with a positive or negative rise, and the reversible graphics will be right either direction. 10 degree stems work well for average riders/amateur racers, while those who want a very aggressive aero position or who want a very upright position can use the 17 degree stem to meet their fit needs.

With its monocoque structure, the 3 Spoke 2D carbon wheel is the winning wheel for triathlon, time-trial and track.

The profile of the rim with the 2D concept and the shape of the spokes like a drop of water (leading edge and trailing edge) make it very aerodynamic.

The front wheel is very light, only 640g, it has an integrated magnet for use with a bike computer and its front "Chrono" hub is built with ceramic bearings.

Combined with a rear CORIMA carbon Disc wheel, it is ideal for track, road cycling or triathlon.

More info: http://www.corima.com/wheels/3-spoke-carbon-wheel.html

刀身的概念和水滴形狀的破風設計。

前輪很輕，只有640克，內置車速計磁石，陶瓷軸承。

name: 2012 Mavic Ellipse Wheelset
description:
Fixed / fixed
Includes one lockring

The most versatile track wheelset, for training and racing.

Ellipse enables you to modulate your training and save time setting up your bike thanks to the flip-flop rear hub. Developed with the demanding racers and trainers of the World Cycling Center at the UCI headquarter in Aigle, no need to say that the performance has not been forgotten.

Low drag thanks to great aerodynamic features:
• 30mm deep rim profile
• Low spoke count (20 front and rear)
• Ultra bladed spokes

Unaltered power transfer thanks to high stiffness:
• Optimized front and rear dishes
• 30mm deep welded rim profile
• Adjustable cartridge bearings (QRM+)

Simple and versatile
• Flip-flop rear hub (no need to disassemble cogs)
• Clincher only

Hubs:

Technologies:
• Qualité de Roulements Mavic + (Mavic bearings quality +) - Our most demanding level. Those cartridge bearings are of course double sealed with C3 internal clearance, and topped with a micro-adjustability system, allowing you to quickly adjust your wheels according to performance goals: precision ""free"" adjustment for maximum fluidity, or perfect high precision setting for all-weather rides.
• Soudé Usiné Process: A welded and milled rim joint is extremely strong, eliminates shuddering when braking, and offers superior wheel balance.

Compatibility:

• Tire: clincher

name: 2012 HED H3 Clincher Front Wheel
description:
700c

The H3 has propelled more Grand Tour riders to the podium than any other wheel. Why? It is not a secret. The H3 is the ultimate in all wind conditions. Whether it is a headwind, crosswind, or tailwind, the H3 is fast. Other wheels (even our own) are certainly speedy, but all other wheels have a specific wind range where they excel. The H3 offers speed no matter where the wind is. The pros know this, and many count on the H3 as their no compromise TT wheel choice.

Our H3 wheels offer full on aero performance in any conditions. The key to the wide range of performance is the combination of a 55mm deep rim section, the airfoil section spokes and the smooth transitions between the two. The 55mm deep rim keeps drag low at shallow yaw angles. When the yaw angle goes past 15° the aero spokes work to keep the wheel from stalling, and drag stays flat. The optimum wind angle for the H3 is an amazing. 

more info: http://www.hedcycling.com/h3/default.asp?content=H3_Clincher

H3是廣泛用於大型巡迴賽的車輪，無論是逆風，側風或順風，H3均有很好的表現。雖然其他車輪（甚至我們自己）也有相當的速度，但專家都知道這一點，其他車輪都有一個特定的風力範圍。而H3的破風能力無論身在何處，也是出類拔萃。很多計算上，H3的TT車輪是作為單車選手的不二之選。

*只適用於開口胎

name: 2011 Cinelli Mash Histogram Frameset
description:
Much imitated, never bettered: the original and most respected street-track frame on the market.

    * FRAME: COLUMBUS Airplane
    * FORK: COLUMBUS Carbon 1-1/8
    * Head set diameter: 45
    * Seat post diameter: 31,6
    * BB shell diameter: BSA

Developed in close collaboration between Cinelli and MASH for a synergy of track heritage and city-riding innovation.

Cinelli MASH is constructed with Columbus Airplane triple butted tubes with an aggressive and unique front sloping geometry (from 2,5deg to 4,5deg) for an extremely fast and reactive ride quality (not for beginners of this style of riding).

Artwork by Benny Gold, famous California graphic designer for surf and skateboards whose previous collaborations have included Nike, Adidas and Burton.

市場上最受人尊敬的的跑街車架。

    *車架：COLUMBUS航空鋁
    *前叉：COLUMBUS碳纖維1-1/8
    *碗組直徑：45
    *座管直徑：31,6
